name: Acala
introduce: Acala is a decentralized finance network powering the aUSD ecosystem, and designed its network to be the financial hub of the Polkadot ecosystem. It's a layer-1 smart contract platform that's scalable, Ethereum-compatible, and optimized for DeFi. With the Acala EVM+, Acala lets developers leverage the aUSD ecosystem while enjoying the best of Ethereum and the full power of Substrate.
